DAMAGEMODIFIER.description: Constrains damage, with optional easing out

expectedMaxDamage.description: The maximum damage used in the easing calculation

causes.description: The list of damage causes that is/is not effected

entities.description: The list of entities that is/is not effected

whitelist.description: Whether to use the `causes` and `entities` list as whitelist

incoming.description: Whether to apply this for incoming damage

outgoing.description: Whether to apply this for outgoing damage / attacks

eased.description: Whether to ease out the damage quadratically

priority.description: The priority of the skill. Only the highest priority between the skills of the two players will be applied

LIVING_ENTITY.description: The data for a living entity

canEquip.description: Whether the entity can pick up items

isBaby.description: Whether the entity is a baby

variant.description:
The variant of axolotl. 

Defaults to a random variant

ABSTRACT_ARROW.description: The data for a abstract arrow

knockbackStrength.description: The knockback strength of the arrow

damage.description: The amount of damage the arrow will do (in hp / half hearts)

pierceLevel.description: The amount of times the arrow can pierce through an entity

critical.description: Whether the arrow should do critical damage

pickupStatus.description: How the arrow can be picked up

potion.description: The potion data for the arrow

fuse.description: The fuse time of the creeper (in ticks)

ignited.description: Whether the creeper is already ignited/primed

explosionRadius.description: The radius of the creeper explosion (in blocks)

DROPPED_ITEM.description: The data for a dropped item

item.description: The item the dropped item will be

EXPERIENCE_ORB.description: The data for a experience orb

experience.description: The amount of xp this xp orb will have

FALLING_BLOCK.description: The data for a falling block

dropItem.description: Whether the block can be dropped as an item when the falling block cannot be placed

cancelDrop.description: Whether or not the block can be placed or dropped as an item

hurtEntities.description: Whether entities can be damaged by this falling block

damagePerBlock.description: The damage per block this falling block will deal to an entity

maxDamage.description: The maximum damage this falling block can deal

isBaby.description: Whether the entity is a baby

tamingDifficulty.description: How hard this horse is to tame

jumpStrength.description: The strength of the horse's jump. TODO

hasChest.description: Whether this horse have a chest

armorSection.description:
The armor this horse wears. 

Defaults to not wearing armor

hasSaddle.description: Whether this horse has a saddle

SPECTRAL_ARROW.description: The data for a spectral arrow

glowingTicks.description: The amount of time to apply the glowing effect for (in ticks)
